short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: dikitale is your intelligent digital ID that acts as your personal data key

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You have probably downloaded dikitale®, and would like to reuse your data on your computer in a secure way. If this is your first time seeing dikitale, then you are entering a universe where you control your data yourself.

dikitale® gathers all your information in one place – namely by you.

·      We're talking about name, address, phone number and e-mail.

·      Securely store your ID papers in your dikitale ID – e.g. driver's license, passport and other ID documents where your social security number is included.

·      Documents are not stored on the phone or on your PC to ensure unauthorized access. All documents are stored in a binary form that is encrypted.

You can advantageously download dikitale® app to the browser that gives you the full benefit of dikitale®. With the app for your browser, you can:

·      Store all your information so you don't have to write it every time you need it.

·      Automatically fill in information fields - for example, in a payment process for an online purchase.

·      Use your data across platforms - such as your smartphone, tablet and computer

·      Get through the payment process quickly and easily on webshops because all your relevant data is already collected in your dikitale ID.

Do you have questions or feedback for dikitale®? Visit us at  https://dikitale.com/
